description:
At the bottom of the page in the documentation for setting up a PostgreSQL database for nova there is a reference to the command "nova-manage db sync". It is not clear if it is appropriate to run the command at this point or if the command should be run later in the setup process. This command is also not referenced at all on the page for setting up the MySQL database.

http://docs.openstack.org/diablo/openstack-compute/admin/content/setting-up-sql-database-postgresql.html
http://docs.openstack.org/diablo/openstack-compute/admin/content/setting-up-sql-database-mysql.html
title: nova-manage db sync

comments.content:
At the bottom of the page in the documentation for setting up a PostgreSQL database for nova there is a reference to the command "nova-manage db sync". It is not clear if it is appropriate to run the command at this point or if the command should be run later in the setup process. This command is also not referenced at all on the page for setting up the MySQL database.

http://docs.openstack.org/diablo/openstack-compute/admin/content/setting-up-sql-database-postgresql.html
http://docs.openstack.org/diablo/openstack-compute/admin/content/setting-up-sql-database-mysql.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jacob-walcik
